quote: I really don't want you to think of Qatar as a hydrocarbon country alone. We know that hydrocarbons will come and go. But education will stay. It is the most important thing for us.
quote_letters: I REALLY DONT WANT YOU TO THINK OF QATAR AS A HYDROCARBON COUNTRY ALONE WE KNOW THAT HYDROCARBONS WILL COME AND GO BUT EDUCATION WILL STAY IT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT THING FOR US
